language.HINT_BLEND_MODE: Blending hits overall performance. Try to avoid using it replacing by prepared graphics if possible.
language.HINT_CACHED_WITH_TRANSFORM: Changing Transform properties (except x,y) on animated item with applied filter(s) or Cache as Bitmap forces Flash Player to cache it every keyframe causing extra CPU cycles
language.HINT_CACHED_WITH_COLOR_EFFECT: Changing Color Effect properties on animated item with applied filter(s) or Cache as Bitmap forces Flash Player to cache it every keyframe causing extra CPU cycles
language.HINT_FILTER_CHANGING: Changing filter(s) properties on animated item forces Flash Player to cache it every keyframe causing extra CPU cycles
language.HINT_CACHED_ANIMATION: Using Cache as Bitmap or filter(s) on DisplayObjects with nested animation forces Flash Player to cache them on every keyframe of the animation causing extra CPU cycles
language.HINT_EXPORTED_ANIMATION: Using Export as Bitmap on DisplayObjects with nested animation brakes the animation because only first frame of the MovieClip is exported
language.HINT_BITMAP_FILLED_SHAPES: Be careful with filling Shapes by Bitmaps. Whole Bitmap will be included into the SWF even if you used only small part of it
language.HINT_WARNINGS_MODE: Disable Warnings mode in the "Publish Settings -> ActionScript Settings" to decrease compile time in a projects with a lot of the code. Be careful - you'll loose Flash Pro compiler warnings. You shouldn't worry if you're writing your code in other powerful IDE supporting warnings
language.HINT_COMPRESSION_PUBLISH: Enable Compress movie in the "Publish Settings" to decrease compiled swf size
language.HINT_XMP_PUBLISH: Turn off Include XMP metadata in the "Publish Settings" to save some extra bytes in the final swf file if you're don't need the metadata in it
language.HINT_SYSTEM_FONT: Try to avoid using system fonts like "_sans", "_serif", "_typewriter" because Flash Player could select a system font which may look different while playing your SWF on a different systems
language.HINT_MASKED_BITMAP: Try to avoid Bitmaps masking. Prepare Bitmaps externally or use context menu item "Convert to Bitmap" in the Flash Pro CS5.5 or higher to convert MovieClips with nested masks into the Bitmaps
language.HINT_SHAPE_WITH_STROKE: Please, consider to replace strokes with fills clicking on menu item "Modify->Shape->Convert Lines to Fills" for sake of performance
language.HINT_RECTANGLE_MASK: Please, consider to replace regular rectangle masks with the DisplayObject.scrollRect property when possible
language.HINT_NOT_ONE_SCENE: Please, consider to use only one Scene in the project, otherwise, project could be difficult to support or develop in the future, especially, by another developers. Use MovieClips as alternative
language.HINT_AS_OR_LABEL: Please, place the ActionScrip and frame labels onto the separate layers (e.g. "as" and "labels") - it should improve the project navigation experience and prevent from occasional needed code or labels removing
language.HINT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_UNUSED: Please, use dynamic TextFields if you wish to deal with them with code, otherwise, use static TextFields
language.HINT_GRAPHIC_FOUND: Please, use Graphic carefully or try to completely avoid using it, because it's really difficult and sometimes impossible to deal with it from code.
language.HINT_LOG_BLUR_NOT_POWER_OF2: Please, use powers of two (2,4,8, ...) when setting blurX and blurY properties for the Filters. This can improve the speed that filters are applied by up to 20â€“30 percent
language.GUI_FLASH_PRO_PATH: Path to the Adobe Flash Professional:
language.GUI_THIRD_PARTY:
Thank you for your interest in the XFLTool! Feel free to send any bug reports, suggestions etc. to me, it will be appreciated.

Third party libs and code used - it could make your life easier too (a-z):
language.GUI_DISCLAIMER:
Disclaimer
By using this software you must accept that you are doing so at your own risk. The publisher accepts no responsibility for any loss of work as a result of using the software.
language.GUI_WELCOME_TEXT: Thank you for your interest in the XFLTool! Feel free to send any bug reports, suggestions etc to me, it will be appreciated.
language.GUI_COMPRESSION_WARNING:
You're about to run Bitmaps compression analysis without project changes. Analysis is not perfectly accurate and can produce wrong results. Please, make sure you have a valid path to the Adobe Flash Professional on the Options page and there are no currently opened projects in the Adobe Flash Professional to proceed further!
It is strongly recommended to tune and optimize the images right in the Flash Pro to achieve more efficient results!
So, do you wish to continue?
language.GUI_WRONG_FLA_FORMAT_WARNING: Sorry, but file "%1" is not a compressed XFL project (it's a FLA project from the Adobe Flash Professional CS4 or earlier). Please, convert it into the XFL project (save in CS5 format, or as Uncompressed CS4 project) and try again.
language.GUI_COMPRESSED_XFL_WARNING: You should save the compressed XFL project (FLA) as the uncompressed one to be able apply any changes to it. Do you want to browse for the path where to save an uncompressed XFL project and continue?
language.GUI_ASK_FOR_UPDATE: Do you wish to update now?
language.GUI_THE_MINER_OFF: use coupon "letsFocusOnMining" for 10% off on the Pro version
